metadata.title: CVE-2021-37519 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in authfile.c memcached 1.6.9 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service via crafted authenticattion file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.6.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.14-1').
